attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make it law that people over 65 years of age are not made to retire, make it law that any employer cannot refuse to keep any employee on just because of there age, and make sure these companies have no get out clauses to make them exempt from this rule. the present law gives employers the right to do as they wish, it does nothing to protect anyone's job in this country age should not be a discriminiation to get rid of a healthy worker.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
